GPIO_P0.description: Port Register 0 for controlling input/output state of P0 pins.

GPIO_P1.description: Port Register 1 for controlling input/output state of P1 pins.

GPIO_P2.description: Port Register 2 for controlling input/output state of P2 pins.

GPIO_P3.description: Port Register 3 for controlling input/output state of P3 pins.

GPIO_P4.description: Port Register 4 for controlling input/output state of P4 pins.

GPIO_P5.description: Port Register 5 for controlling input/output state of P5 pins.

GPIO_P6.description: Port Register 6 for controlling input/output state of P6 pins.

GPIO_P7.description: Port Register 7 for controlling input/output state of P7 pins.

GPIO_P12.description: Port Register 12 for controlling input/output state of P12 pins.

GPIO_P13.description: Port Register 13 for controlling input/output state of P13 pins.

GPIO_P14.description: Port Register 14 for controlling input/output state of P14 pins.

GPIO_PM0.description: Port Mode Register 0 for configuring P0 pins as input or output.

GPIO_PM1.description: Port Mode Register 1 for configuring P1 pins as input or output.

GPIO_PM2.description: Port Mode Register 2 for configuring P2 pins as input or output.

GPIO_PM3.description: Port Mode Register 3 for configuring P3 pins as input or output.

GPIO_PM4.description: Port Mode Register 4 for configuring P4 pins as input or output.

GPIO_PM5.description: Port Mode Register 5 for configuring P5 pins as input or output.

GPIO_PM6.description: Port Mode Register 6 for configuring P6 pins as input or output.

GPIO_PM7.description: Port Mode Register 7 for configuring P7 pins as input or output.

GPIO_PM12.description: Port Mode Register 12 for configuring P12 pins as input or output.

GPIO_PM14.description: Port Mode Register 14 for configuring P14 pins as input or output.

ADC_ADM0.description: A/D Converter Mode Register 0. Configures the operating mode of the A/D converter.

ADC_ADS.description: A/D Channel Select Register. Selects the analog input channel for A/D conversion.

ADC_ADCRH.description: A/D Converter Result Register High. Stores the high byte of the A/D conversion result.

ADC_ADCRL.description: A/D Converter Result Register Low. Stores the low byte of the A/D conversion result.

GPIO_PIM0.description: Port Input Mode Register 0. Configures P0 pins for specific input modes, e.g., enabling noise filters for external interrupts.

GPIO_PIM1.description: Port Input Mode Register 1. Configures P1 pins for specific input modes.

GPIO_POM0.description: Port Output Mode Register 0. Configures P0 pins for specific output modes, e.g., N-channel open-drain.

GPIO_POM1.description: Port Output Mode Register 1. Configures P1 pins for specific output modes.

GPIO_PMC0.description: Port Mode Control Register 0. Selects alternate functions for P0 pins.

GPIO_PMC1.description: Port Mode Control Register 1. Selects alternate functions for P1 pins.

INT_NFEN0.description: Noise Filter Enable Register 0. Enables or disables noise filters for external interrupt pins.

TIM_NFEN1.description: Noise Filter Enable Register 1. Enables or disables noise filters for timer input pins.

PERIPH_ISC.description: Input Switch Control Register. Controls input signal switching for various peripherals.

TIM0_TIS.description: Timer Array Unit 0 Input Switch Control Register. Selects the input signal for Timer Array Unit 0.

TIM0_TMMK00.description: Timer Mask Register 00. Masks interrupts for Timer Array Unit 0, Channel 0.

TIM0_TMMK01.description: Timer Mask Register 01. Masks interrupts for Timer Array Unit 0, Channel 1.

TIM0_TMMK02.description: Timer Mask Register 02. Masks interrupts for Timer Array Unit 0, Channel 2.

TIM0_TMMK03.description: Timer Mask Register 03. Masks interrupts for Timer Array Unit 0, Channel 3.

TIM0_TMMK04.description: Timer Mask Register 04. Masks interrupts for Timer Array Unit 0, Channel 4.

TIM0_TMMK05.description: Timer Mask Register 05. Masks interrupts for Timer Array Unit 0, Channel 5.

TIM0_TMMK06.description: Timer Mask Register 06. Masks interrupts for Timer Array Unit 0, Channel 6.

TIM0_TMMK07.description: Timer Mask Register 07. Masks interrupts for Timer Array Unit 0, Channel 7.

ADC_ADMK.description: A/D Interrupt Mask Register. Masks interrupts generated by the A/D converter.

GPIO_PIMK0.description: Port Input Mode Mask Register 0. Masks interrupts for P0 pin change detection.

GPIO_PIMK1.description: Port Input Mode Mask Register 1. Masks interrupts for P1 pin change detection.

INT_PCMK.description: PC Interrupt Mask Register. Masks interrupts for pin change detection.

SAU0_STMK0.description: Serial Interrupt Mask Register Transmit 0. Masks transmit interrupts for Serial Array Unit 0, Channel 0.

SAU0_STMK1.description: Serial Interrupt Mask Register Transmit 1. Masks transmit interrupts for Serial Array Unit 0, Channel 1.

SAU0_STMK2.description: Serial Interrupt Mask Register Transmit 2. Masks transmit interrupts for Serial Array Unit 0, Channel 2.

SAU0_STMK3.description: Serial Interrupt Mask Register Transmit 3. Masks transmit interrupts for Serial Array Unit 0, Channel 3.

SAU0_SRMK0.description: Serial Interrupt Mask Register Receive 0. Masks receive interrupts for Serial Array Unit 0, Channel 0.

SAU0_SRMK1.description: Serial Interrupt Mask Register Receive 1. Masks receive interrupts for Serial Array Unit 0, Channel 1.

SAU0_SRMK2.description: Serial Interrupt Mask Register Receive 2. Masks receive interrupts for Serial Array Unit 0, Channel 2.

SAU0_SRMK3.description: Serial Interrupt Mask Register Receive 3. Masks receive interrupts for Serial Array Unit 0, Channel 3.

SAU0_SGMK0.description: Serial Interrupt Mask Register Error 0. Masks error interrupts for Serial Array Unit 0, Channel 0.

SAU0_SGMK1.description: Serial Interrupt Mask Register Error 1. Masks error interrupts for Serial Array Unit 0, Channel 1.

SAU0_SGMK2.description: Serial Interrupt Mask Register Error 2. Masks error interrupts for Serial Array Unit 0, Channel 2.

SAU0_SGMK3.description: Serial Interrupt Mask Register Error 3. Masks error interrupts for Serial Array Unit 0, Channel 3.

I2C_IICAMK0.description: IIC Interrupt Mask Register 0. Masks IIC address match interrupts for Serial Array Unit 0, Channel 0.

I2C_IICAMK1.description: IIC Interrupt Mask Register 1. Masks IIC address match interrupts for Serial Array Unit 0, Channel 1.

I2C_IICAMK2.description: IIC Interrupt Mask Register 2. Masks IIC address match interrupts for Serial Array Unit 0, Channel 2.

I2C_IICAMK3.description: IIC Interrupt Mask Register 3. Masks IIC address match interrupts for Serial Array Unit 0, Channel 3.

INT_PR00.description: Interrupt Priority Register 00. Sets the priority level for specific interrupt sources.

INT_PR01.description: Interrupt Priority Register 01. Sets the priority level for specific interrupt sources.

INT_PR02.description: Interrupt Priority Register 02. Sets the priority level for specific interrupt sources.

INT_PR03.description: Interrupt Priority Register 03. Sets the priority level for specific interrupt sources.

INT_PR04.description: Interrupt Priority Register 04. Sets the priority level for specific interrupt sources.

INT_PR05.description: Interrupt Priority Register 05. Sets the priority level for specific interrupt sources.

INT_PR06.description: Interrupt Priority Register 06. Sets the priority level for specific interrupt sources.

INT_PR07.description: Interrupt Priority Register 07. Sets the priority level for specific interrupt sources.

INT_PR10.description: Interrupt Priority Register 10. Sets the priority level for specific interrupt sources.

INT_PR11.description: Interrupt Priority Register 11. Sets the priority level for specific interrupt sources.

INT_PR12.description: Interrupt Priority Register 12. Sets the priority level for specific interrupt sources.

INT_PR13.description: Interrupt Priority Register 13. Sets the priority level for specific interrupt sources.

INT_PR14.description: Interrupt Priority Register 14. Sets the priority level for specific interrupt sources.

INT_PR15.description: Interrupt Priority Register 15. Sets the priority level for specific interrupt sources.

INT_PR16.description: Interrupt Priority Register 16. Sets the priority level for specific interrupt sources.

INT_PR17.description: Interrupt Priority Register 17. Sets the priority level for specific interrupt sources.

INT_PR20.description: Interrupt Priority Register 20. Sets the priority level for specific interrupt sources.

INT_PR21.description: Interrupt Priority Register 21. Sets the priority level for specific interrupt sources.

INT_PR22.description: Interrupt Priority Register 22. Sets the priority level for specific interrupt sources.

INT_PR23.description: Interrupt Priority Register 23. Sets the priority level for specific interrupt sources.

INT_PR24.description: Interrupt Priority Register 24. Sets the priority level for specific interrupt sources.

INT_PR25.description: Interrupt Priority Register 25. Sets the priority level for specific interrupt sources.

INT_PR26.description: Interrupt Priority Register 26. Sets the priority level for specific interrupt sources.

INT_PR27.description: Interrupt Priority Register 27. Sets the priority level for specific interrupt sources.

TIM0_TMR00.description: Timer Mode Register 00. Configures the operating mode for Timer Array Unit 0, Channel 0.

TIM0_TMR01.description: Timer Mode Register 01. Configures the operating mode for Timer Array Unit 0, Channel 1.

TIM0_TMR02.description: Timer Mode Register 02. Configures the operating mode for Timer Array Unit 0, Channel 2.

TIM0_TMR03.description: Timer Mode Register 03. Configures the operating mode for Timer Array Unit 0, Channel 3.

TIM0_TMR04.description: Timer Mode Register 04. Configures the operating mode for Timer Array Unit 0, Channel 4.

TIM0_TMR05.description: Timer Mode Register 05. Configures the operating mode for Timer Array Unit 0, Channel 5.

TIM0_TMR06.description: Timer Mode Register 06. Configures the operating mode for Timer Array Unit 0, Channel 6.

TIM0_TMR07.description: Timer Mode Register 07. Configures the operating mode for Timer Array Unit 0, Channel 7.

TIM0_TPS.description: Timer Clock Select Register 0. Selects the count clock for Timer Array Unit 0.

RCC_CKC.description: System Clock Control Register. Controls the main system clock and its operations.

ADC_PMC.description: Analog Input Setting Register. Configures pins for analog input function for the A/D converter.

ADC_ADPC.description: A/D Port Configuration Register. Specifies which physical pins are used as analog inputs for the A/D converter.

RCC_OSMC.description: Subsystem Clock Supply Mode Control Register. Controls the supply mode for subsystem clocks.

RCC_CMC.description: Clock Operation Mode Control Register. Controls the operating mode of various clock oscillators.

RCC_CSC.description: Clock Operation Status Control Register. Monitors and controls the status of various clock operations.

RCC_OSTS.description: Oscillation Stabilization Time Select Register. Selects the stabilization time for oscillators.

RCC_OSTC.description: Oscillation Stabilization Time Counter Status Register. Indicates the stabilization status of oscillators.

RCC_HOCODIV.description: High-speed On-chip Oscillator Frequency Select Register. Selects the frequency division for the high-speed on-chip oscillator.

RCC_HIOTRM.description: High-speed On-chip Oscillator Trimming Register. Trims the frequency of the high-speed on-chip oscillator.

WDT_WDM.description: Watchdog Timer Mode Register. Configures the operating mode of the watchdog timer.

WDT_WTT.description: Watchdog Timer Timer Register. Stores the count value for the watchdog timer.

DTC_DTCAD.description: DTC Transfer Data Address Register. Specifies the source or destination address for DTC transfers.

DTC_DTSAD.description: DTC Transfer Start Address Register. Specifies the start address for DTC transfers.

DTC_DRS.description: DTC Transfer Control Register. Controls the transfer operations of the DTC.

DTC_DTCD.description: DTC Transfer Data Register. Used for data transfer operations by the DTC.

DTC_DTCNT.description: DTC Transfer Count Register. Specifies the number of transfers to be performed by the DTC.

RCC_PER0.description: Peripheral Enable Register 0. Enables or disables the clock supply to various peripherals.

RCC_PER1.description: Peripheral Enable Register 1. Enables or disables the clock supply to various peripherals.

GPIO_PM13.description: Port Mode Register 13 for configuring P13 pins as input or output.

GPIO_PMC13.description: Port Mode Control Register 13. Selects alternate functions for P13 pins.

ADC_ADCS.description: A/D Converter Start Register. Controls the start and stop of A/D conversion.

RCC_PCKD.description: Port Clock Output Division Register. Configures the division ratio for the clock output on a specific pin.

GPIO_PPR.description: Port Pin Read Register. Provides a mechanism to read the state of multiple port pins simultaneously.

RTC_RTCRDY.description: RTC Ready Register. Indicates the ready status of the Real-Time Clock.

RTC_RTCC0.description: RTC Control Register 0. Controls the fundamental operations of the Real-Time Clock.

RTC_RTCC1.description: RTC Control Register 1. Controls advanced features and settings of the Real-Time Clock.

I2C_IICCTL0.description: IIC Control Register 0. Controls general operations of the I2C interface.

INTL_TIM_ITMC.description: Interval Timer Control Register. Configures the operating mode and clock of the interval timer.

INTL_TIM_ITMF.description: Interval Timer Flag Register. Indicates the status and interrupt flag of the interval timer.

KEYINT_KRM.description: Key Return Mode Register. Configures the key interrupt detection mode.

RTC_RTCL.description: RTC Count Register Low. Stores the low byte of the Real-Time Clock counter value.

RTC_RTCH.description: RTC Count Register High. Stores the high byte of the Real-Time Clock counter value.

COMP_COMPM.description: Comparator Mode Register. Configures the operating mode of the on-chip comparator.

LVD_LVDVDDF.description: LVD Flag Register. Indicates the status of the Low Voltage Detection circuit.

LVD_LVDVDDCR.description: LVD Control Register. Controls the operation of the Low Voltage Detection circuit.

DTC_TRGSR0.description: DTC Trigger Select Register 0. Selects the trigger source for DTC channel 0.

DTC_TRGSR1.description: DTC Trigger Select Register 1. Selects the trigger source for DTC channel 1.

DTC_TRGSR2.description: DTC Trigger Select Register 2. Selects the trigger source for DTC channel 2.

DTC_TRGSR3.description: DTC Trigger Select Register 3. Selects the trigger source for DTC channel 3.

FLASH_FLAPL.description: Flash Access Protection Low Register. Configures low protection settings for Flash memory access.

FLASH_FLAPH.description: Flash Access Protection High Register. Configures high protection settings for Flash memory access.

FLASH_FLARS.description: Flash Access Range Start Register. Specifies the start address of a protected or configurable Flash memory region.

FLASH_FLARE.description: Flash Access Range End Register. Specifies the end address of a protected or configurable Flash memory region.

RCC_HOCOFC.description: HOCO Frequency Control Register. Controls the frequency of the High-speed On-chip Oscillator.

CRC_CRC0CTL.description: CRC Control Register 0. Controls the operation of the CRC calculation unit.

INTL_TIM_ITCS.description: IT Timer Select Register. Selects the clock source for the IT timer.

INTL_TIM_ITCL.description: IT Count Register Low. Stores the low byte of the IT timer count value.

INTL_TIM_ITCH.description: IT Count Register High. Stores the high byte of the IT timer count value.

SAU0_SPS0.description: Serial Peripheral Select Register 0. Selects the clock source and operating mode for Serial Array Unit 0, channels 0-3.

SAU0_SPS1.description: Serial Peripheral Select Register 1. Selects clock source for Serial Array Unit 0, channels 4-7 (if available).

SAU0_SIR00.description: Serial Input Register 00. Stores error flags for Serial Array Unit 0, Channel 0 receive data.

SAU0_SIR01.description: Serial Input Register 01. Stores error flags for Serial Array Unit 0, Channel 1 receive data.

SAU0_SIR02.description: Serial Input Register 02. Stores error flags for Serial Array Unit 0, Channel 2 receive data.

SAU0_SIR03.description: Serial Input Register 03. Stores error flags for Serial Array Unit 0, Channel 3 receive data.

SAU0_SMR00.description: Serial Mode Register 00. Configures the operating mode for Serial Array Unit 0, Channel 0 (UART, SPI, I2C).

SAU0_SMR01.description: Serial Mode Register 01. Configures the operating mode for Serial Array Unit 0, Channel 1.

SAU0_SMR02.description: Serial Mode Register 02. Configures the operating mode for Serial Array Unit 0, Channel 2.

SAU0_SMR03.description: Serial Mode Register 03. Configures the operating mode for Serial Array Unit 0, Channel 3.

SAU0_SCR00.description: Serial Control Register 00. Controls communication parameters for Serial Array Unit 0, Channel 0.

SAU0_SCR01.description: Serial Control Register 01. Controls communication parameters for Serial Array Unit 0, Channel 1.

SAU0_SCR02.description: Serial Control Register 02. Controls communication parameters for Serial Array Unit 0, Channel 2.

SAU0_SCR03.description: Serial Control Register 03. Controls communication parameters for Serial Array Unit 0, Channel 3.

SAU0_SDR00.description: Serial Data Register 00. Stores transmit/receive data for Serial Array Unit 0, Channel 0.

SAU0_SDR01.description: Serial Data Register 01. Stores transmit/receive data for Serial Array Unit 0, Channel 1.

SAU0_SDR02.description: Serial Data Register 02. Stores transmit/receive data for Serial Array Unit 0, Channel 2.

SAU0_SDR03.description: Serial Data Register 03. Stores transmit/receive data for Serial Array Unit 0, Channel 3.

SAU0_SSR00.description: Serial Status Register 00. Indicates the status of data transmission/reception for Serial Array Unit 0, Channel 0.

SAU0_SSR01.description: Serial Status Register 01. Indicates the status of data transmission/reception for Serial Array Unit 0, Channel 1.

SAU0_SSR02.description: Serial Status Register 02. Indicates the status of data transmission/reception for Serial Array Unit 0, Channel 2.

SAU0_SSR03.description: Serial Status Register 03. Indicates the status of data transmission/reception for Serial Array Unit 0, Channel 3.

SAU0_SO0.description: Serial Output Register 0. Controls the output data for Serial Array Unit 0.

SAU0_SOE0.description: Serial Output Enable Register 0. Enables or disables serial output for Serial Array Unit 0.

SAU0_SO00.description: Serial Output Register 00. Controls the output state of SO00 pin for SAU0, channel 0.

SAU0_SO01.description: Serial Output Register 01. Controls the output state of SO01 pin for SAU0, channel 1.

SAU0_SO02.description: Serial Output Register 02. Controls the output state of SO02 pin for SAU0, channel 2.

SAU0_SO03.description: Serial Output Register 03. Controls the output state of SO03 pin for SAU0, channel 3.

SAU0_SSE0.description: Serial Stop Enable Register 0. Enables or disables the stop condition for I2C communication or other serial protocols.

SAU0_SS0.description: Serial Start Register 0. Initiates serial communication for Serial Array Unit 0.

SAU0_ST0.description: Serial Stop Register 0. Stops serial communication for Serial Array Unit 0.

SAU0_CRC0.description: Serial CRC Register 0. Contains CRC calculation results for serial communication.

SAU0_PFLG.description: Serial Peripheral Flag Register. Stores various status flags for the Serial Array Unit 0.

I2C_IICCTL00.description: IIC Control Register 00. Controls specific I2C operations for Serial Array Unit 0, Channel 0.

I2C_IICCTL01.description: IIC Control Register 01. Controls specific I2C operations for Serial Array Unit 0, Channel 1.

I2C_IICWL0.description: IIC Wait Time Low Register 0. Configures the low period of the I2C clock for Serial Array Unit 0.

I2C_IICWH0.description: IIC Wait Time High Register 0. Configures the high period of the I2C clock for Serial Array Unit 0.

I2C_SVA0.description: IIC Slave Address Register 0. Stores the slave address for I2C communication on Serial Array Unit 0.

I2C_AM0.description: IIC Address Match Register 0. Specifies the address match settings for I2C slave mode on Serial Array Unit 0.

FLASH_FLSEC.description: Flash Security Register. Configures security settings for the Flash memory.

FLASH_FLRESD.description: Flash Read-Out Protection Register. Configures read-out protection for the Flash memory.

TIM0_TCR00.description: Timer Count Register 00. Stores the current count value for Timer Array Unit 0, Channel 0.

TIM0_TCR01.description: Timer Count Register 01. Stores the current count value for Timer Array Unit 0, Channel 1.

TIM0_TCR02.description: Timer Count Register 02. Stores the current count value for Timer Array Unit 0, Channel 2.

TIM0_TCR03.description: Timer Count Register 03. Stores the current count value for Timer Array Unit 0, Channel 3.

TIM0_TCR04.description: Timer Count Register 04. Stores the current count value for Timer Array Unit 0, Channel 4.

TIM0_TCR05.description: Timer Count Register 05. Stores the current count value for Timer Array Unit 0, Channel 5.

TIM0_TCR06.description: Timer Count Register 06. Stores the current count value for Timer Array Unit 0, Channel 6.

TIM0_TCR07.description: Timer Count Register 07. Stores the current count value for Timer Array Unit 0, Channel 7.

TIM0_TDR00.description: Timer Data Register 00. Stores data for capture/compare operations for Timer Array Unit 0, Channel 0.

TIM0_TDR01.description: Timer Data Register 01. Stores data for capture/compare operations for Timer Array Unit 0, Channel 1.

TIM0_TDR02.description: Timer Data Register 02. Stores data for capture/compare operations for Timer Array Unit 0, Channel 2.

TIM0_TDR03.description: Timer Data Register 03. Stores data for capture/compare operations for Timer Array Unit 0, Channel 3.

TIM0_TDR04.description: Timer Data Register 04. Stores data for capture/compare operations for Timer Array Unit 0, Channel 4.

TIM0_TDR05.description: Timer Data Register 05. Stores data for capture/compare operations for Timer Array Unit 0, Channel 5.

TIM0_TDR06.description: Timer Data Register 06. Stores data for capture/compare operations for Timer Array Unit 0, Channel 6.

TIM0_TDR07.description: Timer Data Register 07. Stores data for capture/compare operations for Timer Array Unit 0, Channel 7.

TIM0_TSR00.description: Timer Status Register 00. Indicates the status of Timer Array Unit 0, Channel 0.

TIM0_TSR01.description: Timer Status Register 01. Indicates the status of Timer Array Unit 0, Channel 1.

TIM0_TSR02.description: Timer Status Register 02. Indicates the status of Timer Array Unit 0, Channel 2.

TIM0_TSR03.description: Timer Status Register 03. Indicates the status of Timer Array Unit 0, Channel 3.

TIM0_TSR04.description: Timer Status Register 04. Indicates the status of Timer Array Unit 0, Channel 4.

TIM0_TSR05.description: Timer Status Register 05. Indicates the status of Timer Array Unit 0, Channel 5.

TIM0_TSR06.description: Timer Status Register 06. Indicates the status of Timer Array Unit 0, Channel 6.

TIM0_TSR07.description: Timer Status Register 07. Indicates the status of Timer Array Unit 0, Channel 7.

TIM0_TS.description: Timer Channel Start Register 0. Starts the operation of Timer Array Unit 0 channels.

TIM0_TT.description: Timer Channel Stop Register 0. Stops the operation of Timer Array Unit 0 channels.

TIM0_TE.description: Timer Channel Enable Status Register 0. Indicates the enable status of Timer Array Unit 0 channels.

TIM0_TO.description: Timer Output Register 0. Controls the output levels of TOmn pins for Timer Array Unit 0.

TIM0_TOE.description: Timer Output Enable Register 0. Enables or disables the output function of TOmn pins for Timer Array Unit 0.

TIM0_TOL.description: Timer Output Level Register 0. Sets the initial output level of TOmn pins for Timer Array Unit 0.

TIM0_TOM.description: Timer Output Mode Register 0. Configures the output mode of TOmn pins for Timer Array Unit 0.

TIM1_TMR10.description: Timer Mode Register 10. Configures the operating mode for Timer Array Unit 1, Channel 0.

TIM1_TMR11.description: Timer Mode Register 11. Configures the operating mode for Timer Array Unit 1, Channel 1.

TIM1_TMR12.description: Timer Mode Register 12. Configures the operating mode for Timer Array Unit 1, Channel 2.

TIM1_TMR13.description: Timer Mode Register 13. Configures the operating mode for Timer Array Unit 1, Channel 3.

TIM1_TPS.description: Timer Clock Select Register 1. Selects the count clock for Timer Array Unit 1.

TIM1_TCR10.description: Timer Count Register 10. Stores the current count value for Timer Array Unit 1, Channel 0.

TIM1_TCR11.description: Timer Count Register 11. Stores the current count value for Timer Array Unit 1, Channel 1.

TIM1_TCR12.description: Timer Count Register 12. Stores the current count value for Timer Array Unit 1, Channel 2.

TIM1_TCR13.description: Timer Count Register 13. Stores the current count value for Timer Array Unit 1, Channel 3.

TIM1_TDR10.description: Timer Data Register 10. Stores data for capture/compare operations for Timer Array Unit 1, Channel 0.

TIM1_TDR11.description: Timer Data Register 11. Stores data for capture/compare operations for Timer Array Unit 1, Channel 1.

TIM1_TDR12.description: Timer Data Register 12. Stores data for capture/compare operations for Timer Array Unit 1, Channel 2.

TIM1_TDR13.description: Timer Data Register 13. Stores data for capture/compare operations for Timer Array Unit 1, Channel 3.

TIM1_TSR10.description: Timer Status Register 10. Indicates the status of Timer Array Unit 1, Channel 0.

TIM1_TSR11.description: Timer Status Register 11. Indicates the status of Timer Array Unit 1, Channel 1.

TIM1_TSR12.description: Timer Status Register 12. Indicates the status of Timer Array Unit 1, Channel 2.

TIM1_TSR13.description: Timer Status Register 13. Indicates the status of Timer Array Unit 1, Channel 3.

TIM1_TS.description: Timer Channel Start Register 1. Starts the operation of Timer Array Unit 1 channels.

TIM1_TT.description: Timer Channel Stop Register 1. Stops the operation of Timer Array Unit 1 channels.

TIM1_TE.description: Timer Channel Enable Status Register 1. Indicates the enable status of Timer Array Unit 1 channels.

TIM1_TO.description: Timer Output Register 1. Controls the output levels of TOmn pins for Timer Array Unit 1.

TIM1_TOE.description: Timer Output Enable Register 1. Enables or disables the output function of TOmn pins for Timer Array Unit 1.

TIM1_TOL.description: Timer Output Level Register 1. Sets the initial output level of TOmn pins for Timer Array Unit 1.

TIM1_TOM.description: Timer Output Mode Register 1. Configures the output mode of TOmn pins for Timer Array Unit 1.

CRC_CRC0DR.description: CRC Data Register 0. Contains the data input for CRC calculation or the current CRC result.

CRC_CRC0ED.description: CRC End Register 0. Indicates the completion of a CRC calculation or stores the final CRC value.

GPIO_PIOR0.description: Peripheral I/O Redirection Register 0. Redirects peripheral I/O functions to alternative pin locations.

GPIO_PIOR1.description: Peripheral I/O Redirection Register 1. Redirects peripheral I/O functions to alternative pin locations.

GPIO_PIOR2.description: Peripheral I/O Redirection Register 2. Redirects peripheral I/O functions to alternative pin locations.

GPIO_PIOR3.description: Peripheral I/O Redirection Register 3. Redirects peripheral I/O functions to alternative pin locations.

GPIO_GDIDIS.description: Global Digital Input Disable Register. Globally disables digital input buffers for selected pins.
